Package game.match

Class CanHoldCards

java.lang.Object
game.match.State
game.match.CanHoldCards
public class CanHoldCards
extends State
Class CanHoldCards represents a state, in which the legal commands are: hold(h),advice(a),credit($) and statistics(s)
Author:
Miguel Carvalho, Filipe Ferraz, Joao Baptista

      Returns:

      private int getNumberOfGaps()

    • belongsTo

      private boolean belongsTo​(Rank rank)
      This method checks if a card with a specific Rank has a Suit that appears 3 times in the hand. Used to Classify Straight Flush draws types.
      Parameters:
      rank - Specific Rank
      Returns:
      Bolean true/false depending on the outcome.
